text: I successfully defended my PhD thesis!
Our paper 'SciLander: Mapping the Scientific News Landscape' was accepted at ICWSM 2023!
I will be working as a research extern at IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center in the summer of 2022.

The newest version of the NELA-GT dataset has been released. This is a dataset of news articles designed for the study of news credibility. It contains news articles from hundreds of sources. Sources are labeled according to a reliability score.
We have released SenSE, a system for Semantic Shift Exploration and Visualization. Check it out here.
Check out the latest version of our news source credibility dataset. See the GitHub repository for usage examples.
We released the pre-print of our paper "Tell Me Who Your Friends Are: Using Content Sharing Behavior for News Source Veracity Detection".
Our paper "Fake it Till You Make it: Self-Supervised Semantic Shifts for Monolingual Word Embedding Tasks" got accepted at AAAI-2021.
Paper presented at ICWSM 2020 Data Challenge on Misinformation and Abusive behavior in social media.
We have released NELA-GT-2019 - a dataset for assessment of news producer credibility.
RPI-Trust group participated in SemEval-2020 Task 1: Unsupervised Lexical Semantic Change Detection.
